channel.title: Comments for page "Red Fox Ramen"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Red Fox Ramen"

item.title: Only missions, not special missions
item.content:encoded: I was hoping the same thing myself, this does NOT work on Special Missions, only regular missions. Figured I'd try it as 60k Jutsu exp is chump change, and if it helps out with Peeping rolling special quest, great but it doesn't so just a heads up for any others!

item.title: all missions?
item.content:encoded: does this also work for special missions?
